capabilities.name: get_markets
capabilities.description: Retrieves markets from Morpho with pagination, ordering, and filtering support.

capabilities.name: get_whitelisted_markets
capabilities.description: Retrieves only whitelisted markets from Morpho.

capabilities.name: get_asset_price
capabilities.description: Get current price and yield information for specific assets.

capabilities.name: get_market_positions
capabilities.description: Get positions overview for specific markets with pagination and ordering.

capabilities.name: get_historical_apy
capabilities.description: Get historical APY data for a specific market.

capabilities.name: get_oracle_details
capabilities.description: Get oracle details for a specific market.

capabilities.name: get_account_overview
capabilities.description: Get account overview including positions and transactions.

capabilities.name: get_liquidations
capabilities.description: Get liquidation events with filtering and pagination.

capabilities.name: get_vault_allocation
capabilities.description: Get vault allocation for a specific market.

capabilities.name: get_vault_reallocates
capabilities.description: Get vault reallocates for a specific vault.

capabilities.name: get_vaults
capabilities.description: Retrieves all vaults with their current states.

capabilities.name: get_vault_positions
capabilities.description: Get positions for a specific vault.

capabilities.name: get_vault_apy_history
capabilities.description: Get historical APY data for a vault.
